function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of safety and health protocols in the construction industry","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread among construction workers and potential transmission to the community","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of safety and health protocols, regular testing of construction workers, and vaccination","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, thermal cameras for fever detection, and air purification systems","People":"Construction workers, their families, and the community","Owner":"Chilean Chamber of Construction, government agencies, and construction companies"}]}
